sentences.sContent: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.sCn: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

sentences.sContent: ...but also our ability to remain globally competitive...
...people with this rare condition often find their unusual ability burdensome...

...Team building skills are in short supply: Deloitte reports that only 12% of the executives they contacted feel they understand the way people work together in networks and only 21% feel confident in their ability to build cross-functional teams...
...is the ability to make idea-producing connections by linking concepts from different disciplines...
...What distinguishes children from adults is their strong ability to derive joy from what they aredoing...
...A child's ability to become deeply absorbed in something...
...They can affect a person's ability to get a job and qualification for benefits...
...Building on a child's ability to feel joy...
...The ability to quickly thumb through pages is also lost...

phrases.pCn: 体能，体质能力；身体能力

trans.tranCn: 能力， 本领； 才能， 才智
trans.tranOther: the state of being able to do something
